English.Text: The pirates don't expect such a crafty attack. "I was saving these for a special occasion such as this," your weaponsmith burps. The 'special brew' he has concocted consists of a bottle filled with powder, hemp fuse, and a nail surprise. There is a shimmering sound as they explode, and when the smoke clears, your crew frisk the punctured bodies littering the deck, singing "Rollicking band of pirates, we!"
